name: RollingWaves
0:
”Alexa open Rolling Waves”
”Alexa ask Rolling Waves to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rolling waves
des:
Relax to the rhythmic sound of waves rolling onto the shore. This skill replicates the peaceful, repetitive sound of the sea, with waves of varying sizes crashing and receding, perfect for creating a calming environment or helping with sleep.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rolling Waves
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
